layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x68
  LayoutBlockFlow {html} at (0,0) size 800x68
    LayoutBlockFlow {body} at (8,8) size 784x52
      LayoutTable {table} at (0,0) size 234x52 [border: (1px outset #808080)]
        LayoutTableSection (anonymous) at (1,1) size 232x50
          LayoutTableRow {tr} at (0,2) size 232x22
            LayoutTableCell {th} at (2,14) size 170x22 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=0 rs=2 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 166x18
                text run at (2,2) width 166: "This cell spans two rows"
            LayoutTableCell {th} at (174,2) size 56x22 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=1 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 52x18
                text run at (2,2) width 52: "xxx xxx"
          LayoutTableRow {tr} at (0,26) size 232x22
            LayoutTableCell {th} at (174,26) size 56x22 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=1 c=1 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 52x18
